msContents.summary: Concerning frumentationes to be observed by 20th Palmyrene cohort

msItemStruct.note: Fragment of col. i, lines 5-6 added to left side of (a); letters i and iv prove reading of Antoninianae suggested by Welles, p. 227, n. 6; fragments from DP 42/P.Dura 73.

supportDesc.support: 2 frames.Frame 18:1, (a) 160 x 271 mm, (A) 2 col., col. i: 6 lines, bottom right margins, col. ii: 73 lines, left margin, (B) blankFrame 18:2, fragments (b)-(k) (in mm), (B) sides blank, (b) 189 x 82, 15 lines, no margins, (c) 38 x 35, 3 lines, no margins, (d) 44 x 29, 3 lines, no margins, (e) 37 x 52, 2 lines, no margins, (f) 46 x 22, 2 lines, no margins, (g) 54 x 74, 2 lines, bottom margin (?), (h) 75 x 19, 4 lines, no margins, (i) 23 x 25, 2 lines, no margins, (j) 22 x 18, 2 lines, no margins, (k) 43 x 39, 2 lines, no margins
